name: Player A. Enable
description:
**Enable/Disable** players at system startup 
 . 
 **Squeezelite-R2:** Lightweight headless squeezebox emulator capable to play server side upsampled and decoded PCM streams or 'native' DSD formats.[**More Info**](https://github.com/marcoc1712/squeezelite-R2/releases) 
 **Squeezelite:** official version - compiled to reproduce only pcm and dsd.[**More Info**](https://github.com/ralph-irving/squeezelite) 
 **Networkaudiod:** demon for HqPlayer.[**More Info**](https://www.signalyst.com/consumer.html) 
 **LogitechMediaServer:** streaming audio server.[**More Info**](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Logitech_Media_Server) 
 **BubbleUpnp:** [**More Info**](https://www.bubblesoftapps.com/bubbleupnpserver2/) 
 **HQPlayer Embedded:** Embedded version of HQPlayer.[**More Info**](https://www.signalyst.com/custom.html) 
 **Mpd:** Music Player Daemon (MPD) is a flexible, powerful, server-side application for playing music.[**More Info**](https://www.musicpd.org/) 
 **UpMpdCli:** UPnP Media Renderer front-end for MPD.[**More Info**](https://www.lesbonscomptes.com/upmpdcli/) 
 **RoonBridge:** software package that extends Roon's audio playback capabilities to other devices or computers in your home.[**More Info**](https://kb.roonlabs.com/RoonBridge) 
 **RoonServer:** media server (Only x86).[**More Info**](https://roonlabs.com/) 
 **MPD_sima:** A non-interactive autoqueue client. It will queue new tracks following last.fm similar artists suggestions.[**More Info**](https://kaliko.me/mpd-sima/) 
 **MYmpd:** MPD Web GUI. Can be reached from a browser by simply typing in the host's IP address.[**More Info**](https://jcorporation.github.io/myMPD/) 
 **MinimServer:** MinimServer is a new UPnP AV music server with a number of innovative features that make it easier to organize and explore your music collection. [**More Info**](https://minimserver.com/index.html) 
 . 
 .

parameters.name: Squeezelite-R2
parameters.description: Enable or Disable Squeezelite-R2 at boot
